name: VC Partner — AI/Tech Focus
description: Active VC partner tracking AI developments, infrastructure investments, and tech strategy. Heavy consumer of a16z content and technical deep-dives. Content Hypothesis: 85% Specialization in AI/Tech infrastructure with 15% cross-disciplinary curiosity in adjacent sectors (defense-tech, enterprise software). Prefers strategic analysis over pure research papers. Cross-Disciplinary Curiosity: Open to macro content if it connects to AI capex, chip supply chains, or tech regulation. Should see occasional 'bridge' content linking AI to other investment themes.
expected_behavior: High similarity scores for AI/tech infrastructure episodes
a16z and similar VC-perspective podcasts should rank highly
Topics like OpenAI, AI infrastructure, enterprise AI should surface
Should NOT see unrelated content (crypto, pure macro) in top 5
Bookmarked episodes should have outsized influence on recommendations
